data.name: Galactic Junk League - Pirate Launch Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Pirate Launch Pack includes:

  • DLC exclusive Pirate ships Privateers, Insanity, Crazy Eye, Despot
  • complete Pirate building block set
  • 30x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 14 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 600 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Pirate Launch Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

data.short_description: Pirate Launch Pack DLC for Galactic Junk League with 4 exclusive Pirate ships, complete Pirate building block set and 30 Space Whisky and 14 days of Pilot License to double your XP rewards
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
